Package eu.amidst.core.learning.parametric.bayesian.utils

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TransitionMethod
    This interface defines the transition method.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DataPosterior
    This class stores the posterior probabilities over a set of latent variables for an item with a given id.
    DataPosteriorAssignment
    This class stores the posterior probabilities over a set of latent variables and a joint assignment for another ones.
    PlateuIIDReplication
    This class extends the abstract class PlateuStructure and defines Plateu IID Replication.
    PlateuStructure
    This class defines a Plateu Structure.
    VMPLocalUpdates
    This class extends the class MessagePassingAlgorithm and implements the interfaces InferenceAlgorithm and Sampler.
